Hello World!

I’m a data scientist and quantitative developer passionate about telling stories about businesses, economy, and nations using financial data and open source tools.

I work on quantitative risk models, integrating behavioral and macroeconomic factors into risk frameworks. My focus areas are credit risk modelling (PD/EAD/LGD), regulatory analytics (CCAR/CECL/IFRS9), climate risk stress testing and portfolio analytics.
